name: Midearth
description: A soldier killed by your own troops, a Goddess has taken mercy on you and has let you reincarnate. There's a catch, however, you must reincarnate as a member of the Paladin Empire or the Ravager Rebellion and hopefully bring the long-needed peace between them to life. Customize your characters, romance, craft, choose your actions and much more on your journey to ravage or protect the lands of Crescent.
